eeye dinayedi elesa sidukala parikshawalin wahana 28 k polis bharayata gena thibuna.me athara, nirodhayana nithi ullanghanaya karamin wennappuwa - wayikkala pradeshaye 20 denekuta wadi pirisak sahabhagi wu wiwaha mangala uthsawayak wennappuwa polisiya saha mahajana saukhya parikshakawarun wisin athhituwimata katayuthu kala.mita sahabhagi wu pirisa ja-ala pradeshaye sancharana sima ullanghanaya karamin wennappuwata pamina athi athara, owunta erehiwa nithimaya piyawara ganimata niyamitha bawath, siyaludenama nirodhayanayata yomukara athi bawath wartha wanawa.

ohuta tharagaye wiraya sammanaya da himiwiya.indiya inime di sachin thendulkar 38 k, wirath koli 34 k, mahendra sin doni 34 k ha yusuf pathan 30 k lesa lakunu ras kalaha.pandu yawimedi jonstan lakunu 16 kata kadulu 2 kda, dokrel lakunu 49 kata kadulu 2 k da dawa gathha..palamuwa panduwata paharadun ayarlantha pila oowar 47.5kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 207k ras kele ya.owun randawagath lakunu wegaya 4.32ki.aarambhaka pithikaru wiliyam potarfild daksha lesa panduwata pahara demin agana lakunu 75k ras kele hathare pahara 6k ha haye paharak samangini.nil oo briyon lakunu 46k da aleks kusak lakunu 24k da ras kalaha.pandu yawime di indiya kridaka yuwaraj sin daksha pandu yawimaka nirathawemin lakunu 31kata kadulu 5k bida heliya.
